duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage large scale, multi-year HRIS transformative program and projects in Insurance and/or Banking software applications.
Implement Applied’s Epic AMS and SAFe setup
Demonstrate exceptional oral & written communication skills, customer service & design thinking mindset, and collaborative skills.
Understand the Software Development Lifecycle, SAFe Implementation practices & PMI methodology for project management.
Work with Azure DevOps and Smartsheet (or similar tools).
Implement SaaS and cloud solutions, systems architecture and IT operations, acquisition and merger of new companies into existing IT operations, and systems integration.
Conduct stakeholder meetings, Joint Application Design (JAD) sessions, rapid prototyping, and facilitate business process design concepts and principles.
Perform each essential duty satisfactorily and meet education requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Software Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
